name: holographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
by using, or in the form of, a hologram (= an image made with a laser in which the objects shown look solid, as if they are real, rather than flat) or holograms: When the actor could not appear at the televised ceremony to accept the award, the producers figured out how to teleport him holographically. The architects created a computer-generated 3-dimensional model of the design and presented it holographically to their client. Related word
holographic
More examplesFewer examplesThe museum exhibit projected holographically-generated images of people who lived in the country during colonial times.
